name: The Wonderful Adventure Of a Dysfunctional Introvert
name_original: The Wonderful Adventure Of a Dysfunctional Introvert
description:
I've struggled with being socially dysfunctional pretty much my whole life and recently I decided I needed to express that artistically in some way. Since "words" aren't really my strong point, that leaves songs and poems pretty much off the table. So, I decided to express it with the one art form I'm most comfortable, video games.

I don't know if it's depressing melancholy, or dark humor... It wasn't necessarily made for anyone else to play, but just to get it off my chest.

-Dan, a dysfunctional introvert
